name: Synchrony Financial
description: Synchrony Financial is a premier consumer financial services company headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut. Established in 2003, Synchrony specializes in providing private label credit cards, promotional financing, and installment loans to consumers. The company operates through a range of partners, including retailers, manufacturers, and health service providers, offering tailored credit solutions that enhance customer loyalty and drive growth for its partners. With a dedicated focus on innovation, Synchrony leverages technology to deliver a seamless omni-channel experience, enabling customers to manage their accounts online and via mobile applications. The firm is committed to responsible lending practices and financial education, empowering consumers to make informed financial decisions. Synchrony also emphasizes its corporate social responsibility by engaging in community initiatives and sustainable business practices. Its expansive network and strong partnerships have positioned Synchrony as a leader in the consumer finance space, consistently adapting to market trends and consumer needs.

key_executives.name: Lina W. K. G. K. A. W. K. K. A.

seo.meta_description: Explore Synchrony Financial, a leader in consumer financial services providing innovative credit solutions and digital banking. Discover our commitment to responsible lending and community engagement.

faq.question: What services does Synchrony Financial provide?
faq.answer: Synchrony Financial offers private label credit cards, promotional financing, and installment loans.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Synchrony Financial?
faq.answer: Brian Doubles is the CEO of Synchrony Financial.

faq.question: Where is Synchrony Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Synchrony Financial is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Synchrony Financial?
faq.answer: The main products include private label credit cards, promotional financing, and installment loans.
